body.name: HappyTrends Outdoor Rug Reversible Portable Plastic Straw Camping Rugs for Outside RV,Large Waterproof Outdoor Area Rugs for Patio,Deck,Porch,Balcony(5'x 8',White&Gray)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 23 hrs 4 mins
features: VERSATILE & FUNCTIONAL: The outdoor rug is designed to be an ideal addition to your outdoor living area. The rug is reversible, and it is suitable for many scenes such as outdoor courtyards, gardens, patios, decks, RVs, and campsites. The mat comes in various sizes, making it easy to find the perfect fit for your needs. Whether you want to add a pop of color to your outdoor space or create a cozy atmosphere, this mat will suit any space.

PORTABLE & EASY TO USE: One of the best things about the outdoor area rug is its portability. The mat is made from lightweight plastic straws with multiple fold lines for easy folding and unfolding.Its foldable design makes it convenient to carry around. You can take it with you on picnics, camping trips, beach days, and more. When not in use, simply fold it up and store it until next time.

WATERPROOF & EASY TO CLEAN: The camping rug is made of waterproof materials that make it resistant to moisture and stains. This means you don't have to worry about rain, spills, or splashes damaging your mat. To clean the rug, simply wipe it down with a damp cloth or hose it off with water. If you spill something on the rug, use a gentle soap and water solution to remove the stain. Avoid using harsh chemicals or abrasive scrubbers that can damage the rug's surface.

UV PROTECTION: The sun's rays can be harmful to outdoor fabrics, fading and damaging them over time. Fortunately, our outdoor rug comes with UV stabilization, so you won't have to worry about color fading due to sun exposure and you can enjoy vibrant colors throughout the summer months. The outdoor RV rug is designed to withstand the rigors of outdoor use, making it a reliable choice for many years to come.

HIGH-QUALITY & ECO-FRIENDLY: The outdoor reversible rug is made of high-quality, environmentally friendly, and recyclable materials. The rug's fabric is durable and long-lasting, ensuring that you get the most out of your investment. The rug is also free from harmful chemicals and toxins, making it safe for you and the environment. Every detail of its creation, from its manufacturing to transportation, has been made with the environment in mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I absolutely love it!
reviews.reviewText: It is lightweight and easy to pack up and take with me. Before I laid this down on the back patio (where it looks amazing!), I accidentally took it camping. Best mistake I ever made, we needed something to put down for my niece to play on and since we all brought sleeping bags and no one wanted to put theirs on the bare ground, I grabbed the rug. It was easy to wash off after she ate and played on it for hours. It isn’t scratchy, was easy to fold back up, stayed cool in the hot sun, and the people on the campsite next to me even asked where I got it! It is now placed nicely under my patio set and compliments my set perfectly. My only complaint is that I didn’t buy the biggest size!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's very light weight. But not cheaply made
reviews.reviewText: Item as described. It seems like it is made well. Time will tell. It is nice and light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks exactly like the photos
reviews.reviewText: Bought 2 of these for my front porch .. looks like the photos. I like that they are reversible , both sides look nice . These are very lightweight , will need to be tacked down so they don't blow away, they are plastic ... Not sure I'd buy again , but they will work fine to cover the ugly porch floor until I can replace it . I was only using these for a temporary fix and I think that's all they may be good for and the price is perfect for what I needed too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great covering for my cement patio
reviews.reviewText: I used this product as an outdoor rug. I have a canopy I put up on my patio, I put this down to use as flooring because I wanted something nicer looking than the cement floor of my patio. Great choice , was much cheaper than outdoor carpet, and it doesn't mold or mildew because it's made out of waterproof material so when it rains it does not absorb water , the water runs right off. Looks beautiful as well! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wasn't what I expected
reviews.reviewText: Simply based on the photos and description I would say it was not what I expected. The color was a different gray it was my first time buying an outdoor rug/mat so I wasn't sure what to expect in texture and feel of it. It had some cushion to it easy to fold and unfold. He was extremely light and easy to clean. I feel the look of it in the pictures has a better and nicer presentation of quality than in person. Overall I'm giving it five stars because the quality of it was good.
